summary: Real water in the forge trough! Requires ENB.
descriptionHtml:
Simply changes the forge trough mesh to use a water property instead of a texture property, like the horse trough. This should be compatible with just about anything as long as it doesn't alter the forge mesh.

Requires:
[url=http://enbdev.com/download_mod_tesskyrim.html]ENB for TESV[/url]
ENB preset (any should be fine)
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/58061/?]ENB Water on Horse Trough and Blacksmith Forge by Skysan4298[/url]

[b]FAQ[/b]
Q: Can I use mods that add/move/remove blacksmith forges without problems?
A: Absolutely! I altered the mesh rather than using an overlaying water so you can add/move/remove as many forges as you want and this mod will still work.

Q: Can I use texture replacers for the blacksmith forges without problems?
A: Of course. By "mesh alteration" I really mean just going into nifskope and copy/pasting properties from the horse trough. The mesh itself (vertices) aren't touched at all other than removing vertex colors. If you want to keep the vertex colors, use the Blacksmith Forge Water Darker Version.

Q: Doesn't Skysan4298's mod already do this?
A: Nope! They made a plugin that lets ENB recognize when a water property is being used by mods like this one orÂ [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/18818]Blacksmithforge water fix by hexaae/rolloLG[/url].

Q: Do I really need ENB to use this mod?
A: Yes, otherwise the water won't display properly. [url=http://enbdev.com/download_mod_tesskyrim.html]Seriously just go download ENB why haven't you downloaded it yet.[/url]

Blacksmith Forge Water Trough Fix is a pretty small mod, just a mesh alteration, so there isn't a very high chance of bugs or conflicts. However if you find any issues, please let me know and I will try and fix it!

This is my first public mod, I hope you like it!
author: yiffening
